etymology.description: Depicts a divination crack in a tortoise shell or bone
etymology.interpretation: The character 卜(bǔ, "divination") represents the practice of divination used in ancient China, often involving the interpretation of cracks in tortoise shells or bones.

examples.chinese: 占卜是一种神秘的艺术(占卜是一種神秘的藝術)。
examples.pinyin: Zhānbǔ shì yī zhǒng shénmì de yìshù.

examples.chinese: 他通过卜算未来(他通過卜算未來)，探寻隐秘的命运(探尋隱秘的命運)。
examples.pinyin: Tā tōngguò bǔsuàn wèilái, tànxún yǐnmì de mìngyùn.
examples.english: He uses divination to predict the future, seeking out his hidden destiny.

examples.chinese: 古代人常以卜问吉凶(古代人常以卜問吉凶)，以求平安和顺(以求平安和順)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdài rén cháng yǐ bǔ wèn jíxiōng, yǐ qiú píng'ān hé shùn.
examples.english: Ancient people often practiced divination to determine fortune, in order to pursue peace and order.
